title: P2P Resources Management
subtitle: or how we could turn our transactional data in one of the most powerful tools for change
description: Here after is the fruit of my travel on the roads of collaborative economy, linked data and political indignation. This is an attempt to sketch what value could create a well designed peer-to-peer resources management system; an ongoing work aiming to gather the theorical basis for prototyping. Feedbacks and sharing welcome!
